title: First law of thermo - U change for two processes

content.question: Two identical containers hold identical samples of an ideal gas in the same initial state. In Process <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>, an amount of energy <math alttext="Q" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi></math> is transferred to one of the containers through heating during an isothermal expansion. In Process <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, the same amount of energy <math alttext="Q" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi></math> is transferred to the other container during an isovolumetric heating process. Which of the following correctly compares <math alttext="delta U sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="delta U sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>, the change in internal energy for processes <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> and <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="delta U sub 2 is greater than, open parenthesis, delta U sub 1 equals 0, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="delta U sub 2 is greater than delta U sub 1, which is greater than 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="delta U sub 2 equals delta U sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="delta U sub 2 is less than delta U sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo><</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math>
